meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nebulous.
meanings.sent1: The nebulousnesses of the fog made it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the nebulousnesses of the clouds in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The nebulousnesses of the situation left everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were lost in the nebulousnesses of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The nebulousnesses of the dream slowly faded upon waking.

meanings.definition: A nebulous or hazy appearance or quality.
meanings.sent1: The morning mist had a mysterious nebulousnesses to it.
meanings.sent2: The nebulousnesses of the smoke made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The nebulousnesses of the mirror made her reflection look distorted.
meanings.sent4: The nebulousnesses of the memory lingered in the back of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The nebulousnesses of the distant mountain added to its allure.
